title: Tucson Oversight and Records Integration
summary: Captures Tucson-area civic correspondence concerning record management, oversight procedure, and data forwarding to national review.
details: Outlines communication attempts with Tucson administrative offices and oversight divisions.
Includes confirmation of record receipt but absence of substantive feedback, highlighting procedural bottlenecks.
Serves as a control dataset comparing border-state responsiveness to California municipal patterns.

updates.text: Initial Tucson entries logged for WCO integration.
Review scheduled for inclusion in binational ledger summary.
